title: Tech women's soccer reveals spring 2022 schedule - VT hokiesports.com
content: Tech women's soccer reveals spring 2022 schedule  VT hokiesports.com
description: Fully engaged in its offseason training program, the Virginia Tech women's soccer team announced on Monday its spring 2022 competitive schedule, featuring five exhibition outings that will serve as early opportunities for the Hokies to build chemistry ahead of their formal fall season.
